LiquidateCard.NAME: Liquidate
LiquidateCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL Gain !M! times its energy cost in #ygold. NL Exhaust.

GlitteringAegisCard.NAME: Glittering Aegis
GlitteringAegisCard.DESCRIPTION: Every time you gain #ygold, gain !M! block.

BribeCard.NAME: Bribe
BribeCard.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! gold. NL Choose a card from your draw pile and add it to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust
BribeCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! gold. NL Choose a card from your draw pile and add it to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't afford to play this card.
I'm too broke to play this card.
This card costs more than I can afford.
I need at least 25 #ygold to play this card.
I don't have enough gold to play this card.

AffluenceAblationCard.NAME: Affluence Ablation
AffluenceAblationCard.DESCRIPTION: Every time you would take damage, spend 1 gold to reduce the damage by 1.
